any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 06:03:11 pm[/size][hr] if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) // rune scimi here { PkingDelay = 22; actionTimer = 22; }

resetAnimation(); int wepdelay = 0;

does this have anything to do with this?
